Class TextFileReader

java.lang.Object
  Main.TextFileReader

public class TextFileReader
extends java.lang.Object

Object used for reading and processing all the files that are used to describe the cases in a dataset.

Method Detail

readTextFile

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readTextFile(java.lang.String filepath)
Reads all the lines in the file referenced by the path.

Parameters:
filepath - String path to the file.
Returns:
ArrayList with all the lines found in filepath.

splitCommas

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> splitCommas(java.lang.String line)
Splits the elements separated by ',' in a single dataset line.

Parameters:
line - String with comma-separated elements.
Returns:
ArrayList of elements or empty if there was some format error.

getInnerSolutions

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInnerSolutions(java.lang.String line)
Splits all the inner elements in a single solution. Returns the main element as the first position in the ArrayList and the sub-elements in the following ones.

Parameters:
line - String with a single solution.
Returns:
ArrayList with the main element in the first position and the sub-elements in the following ones. If the array is empty means that there was a format error.
